name: Everyday Spelunker
description:
30th SPELUNKER ANNIVERSARY!
Now you can explore the cave while on the go!

OLD MEMORIES AND OUTRAGEOUS ADVENTURES ARE BEING REVIVED!
That’s right - gaming’s reputed weakest character has finally made his way to your iOS device, and his fate rests squarely in your hands. It’s up to you to safely navigate him through the dangerous caves in search of legendary treasures.

THE 1985 CONSOLE VERSION FAITHFULLY RECREATED!
The game is faithful to the original console version – down to how quickly the hyperventilating explorer burns through his air supply. But you’ll be holding your breath plenty as you try to maneuver past bats, spiders, snakes and other horrors lurking within the four colossal levels!

THAT EERIE CHANGE IN MUSIC CAN ONLY MEAN ONE THING…
A nasty ghost has caught your scent!! These relentless pests have been waiting around for more than three decades for a new slew of unsuspecting explorers… and they’re primed to exact their revenge. But don’t overlook a steam geyser, pit or ledge or you’ll be quickly reminded of why the Spelunkers who live to see daylight are a select breed.

A LITTLE LOVE FROM THE DEVELOPERS
In case you haven’t noticed a recurring theme – there are tons of ways to die in Spelunker! So, to show how much we feel your pain, we’ve added a rope-assist feature that can be activated in the UI. This handy little feature will make jumping from rope to ledge a much safer prospect than ever before.

FEATURES
• Four colossal caves to explore
• Touch optimized controls
• New rope-assist feature – no more falling!
• Worldwide leaderboards and achievements
• Cheating? New continue feature – you may finally complete the game!
• Wallpaper and sound options
